com.google.template.soy.jssrc.restricted
Class SoyJsCodeUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.google.template.soy.jssrc.restricted.SoyJsCodeUtils

public class SoyJsCodeUtils
extends Object

Utilities for building code for the JS Source backend.

Important: This class may only be used in implementing plugins (e.g. functions, directives).

Method Detail

genJsExprUsingSoySyntax

public static JsExpr genJsExprUsingSoySyntax(Operator op,
                                             List<JsExpr> operandJsExprs)
Generates a JS expression for the given operator and operands assuming that the JS expression for the operator uses the same syntax format as the Soy operator.

Parameters:
op - The operator.
operandJsExprs - The operands.
Returns:
The generated JS expression.

genJsExprUsingSoySyntaxWithNewToken

public static JsExpr genJsExprUsingSoySyntaxWithNewToken(Operator op,
                                                         List<JsExpr> operandJsExprs,
                                                         String newToken)
Generates a JS expression for the given operator and operands assuming that the JS expression for the operator uses the same syntax format as the Soy operator, with the exception that the JS operator uses a different token (e.g. "!" instead of "not").

Parameters:
op - The operator.
operandJsExprs - The operands.
newToken - The equivalent JS operator's token.
Returns:
The generated JS expression.
